name: Last Blade Standing
description:
A black and white small puzzle game about vengeance.

This was made for my ongoing challenge of one game per week ! It's small but I hope you have fun for a few minutes ;)

SAVE SYSTEM DOES NOT WORK, PROGRESS IS ONLY SAVED UNTIL LEVEL 2

Controls:
[ZQSD]Input slash direction
[Arrows] input move direction
[Space] Cancel a move
[Mouse] Over an enemy reveals their plans
